website_summaries.verdict: Great material to keep beer cold, very affordable and carbonation settings are easy to use.
pros: It can keep your beer fresh, cold and carbonated for up to 2 weeks
The tap handle is interchangeable, making it easy to customize your beer the way you like it
Comes with a one-year warranty and a lifetime of customer support
cons: If you tighten the regulator too tight, the ring easily moves out of place, causing the carbonation to seep out
CO2 bulb is on the small side

customer_reviews.title: Want a keg with problems and support doesn't respond?
customer_reviews.text: After buying 2 uKegs, both started experiencing problems with the regulators. Specifically, you could never shut the C02 completely off and now I'm spending $$ on C02 when I could be buying more beer. And to make it even more fun... Two emails sent to support over the last several days have gone unanswered. You guys need to support your product better. Pretty simple. The review hear speak to that issue. I'm going back to growlers. Much less hassle. uKeg= poor execution, poor support
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Mccall

customer_reviews.title: This product doesn't work!
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this product unless you like watching one CO2 cartridge after another empty in 3 seconds! Their propriety "CO2 regulator cap" is crap. On top of that, their customer service is non-existent!
customer_reviews.author: Philip Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best Gift Ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for hubby for Father's Day! He is LOVING it! He has refilled it twice so far, first time finished the beer off in 2 days, Second time went 6 days says the beer was still as fresh as the day he first got it from the Brewery. Best Gift Ever!!!
customer_reviews.author: Hawes Family

customer_reviews.title: No Negatives Here!
customer_reviews.text: Had I read the reviews before making the purchase, I'd've had second thoughts. However, my own experience, thus far has been absolutely positive. It's obviously a very high quality piece of equipment. Installing the presure canister was a breeze. Everything seems magnificent. absolutely no leakage. The enclosed manual and packaging give the impression of a company truly interested in customer satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: ibaconi

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product and it broke the very first time I used it. Pay attention to the fact that it is not returnable. If you buy this you may also be out almost 200$ with no way of getting any kind of replacement.
customer_reviews.author: tim

customer_reviews.title: Poor product. 200$ poorly spent
customer_reviews.text: Was purchased in January and given for a birthday gift on Feb. 15. It was used for the first time in early March. Began leaking and spraying beer through fittings by April 28. Return deadline was March 2! Poor product. 200$ poorly spent!!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas C. Fournier

customer_reviews.title: Useless- received defective product.
customer_reviews.text: We received a defective product. It leaks. We’d like to return, but have been told we cannot. Buyer beware- this is a lot of money to send for a useless product.
customer_reviews.author: DavisMom111213

customer_reviews.title: This is my 1st one star review and I hate that it deserves it especially because it’s such a ...
customer_reviews.text: Got a faulty one that cracks the cartridge prematurely and I’ve tried all the troubleshooting possible. You can’t return this item, and I’ve called but just don’t have the time or Patience to deal with fixing something that costs so much! Wish I hadn’t bought this and listened to the other reviewers. This is my 1st one star review and I hate that it deserves it especially because it’s such a great idea
customer_reviews.author: Daniek

customer_reviews.title: Faulty product!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a Christmas gift for my husband. They do not ship to Hawaii so I had to have it shipped to a friend who then shipped it to me. first time: When putting the Co2 cartridge in you could hear the gas leaking. Co2 didn’t last the whole growler. Second time using it: Had it filled and then it leaked all over my car seat. My husband tried to put the Co2 cartridge in and it exploded, nearly taking off his finger. We wasted 3 Co2 cartridges trying. Gas is leaking. The growler is still leaking from the cap and spigot . His $26 beer is now flat.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Souza

customer_reviews.title: A great way to keep beer cold and fresh
customer_reviews.text: Really great quality. Keeps beer cold and bubbly for a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Loiselle

customer_reviews.title: bought for my best man. guy owns a brewery
customer_reviews.text: bought for my best man. guy owns a brewery. HE LOVED IT. i mean, it was quite possibly the best reception i've ever gotten from a gift i've given. he had zero complaints and planned to get another one (for business purposes).
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni DiSalvatore

customer_reviews.title: Coolest thing you could ever get a craft beer guy ...
customer_reviews.text: Coolest thing you could ever get a craft beer guy or girl. Got this as a gift for my boyfriend. It's definitely a show stopper when he goes to the brewery to fill up.
customer_reviews.author: Jazmin Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every penny and dollar!
customer_reviews.text: I think this was the best invention made if you are a beer connoisseur. Make sure your state does allow the fill of the 128. Mine does, bought this for my husband and he is estatic about it. It held his IPA Beer for 3 weeks. Still frothy and tasted like he just got it filled. It’s worth the money especially when it’s hard to get your favorite beer on tap. He bought a regular growler and the beer only last for maybe 2-3 days. Most impressed and I don’t even like beer!
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and customer service is the best I have experienced in many years
customer_reviews.author: Royal W. Craig

customer_reviews.title: Originally loved it, now can't use it...
customer_reviews.text: Originally I liked how durable the growler was constructed. Always got remarks about it when I took it to the local brewery to refill it. But within a month or so, the locking mechanism that prevents an accidental discharge of your beer if you bump the tap began to stick and become hard to operate. Now, just 5 months after rarely and gently using this product, the locking mechanism is completely inoperable and I cannot access the tasty beer I know is inside there. Just contacted Growler Werks technical support and awaiting instructions. 12/3/19 Tech support quickly responded and offered some troubleshooting suggestions. Will try these and update.
customer_reviews.author: darvon6900

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 uses and months later still no resolution
customer_reviews.text: I guess I should have paid closer attention to the bad reviews on this product. After only 2 uses it started leaking out of the tap neck. My husband has been communicating back and forth with the friendly vendor for two months. But, even after they finally sent us replacement gaskets the unit still leaks. Getting frustrated and just want a refund at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Swenson

customer_reviews.title: This product worked well for awhile. It started losing ...
customer_reviews.text: This product worked well for awhile. It started losing pressure and I replaced the O-Ring in the cap. This fix worked for a short time but now parts fell out of the cap with no way to know how to re-insert them. I get no pressure when installing a new cartridge. The web-site needs info on product, which I no longer have, in order to get any advice.....
customer_reviews.author: Terrence Pohl

customer_reviews.title: The carb top destroys the product
customer_reviews.text: everything about the product minus the plastic, rubber and ill informed connection point destroys the usability of the growler. The product would be phenomenal and worth the price as long as the co2 compartment was built for longevity and not for first appearances. All in all, very disappointed that the company would leave such a crucial point so vulnerable side note: Ive contacted the company about the issues and they had recited the SOP on adding a CO2 cartridge and making sure you don't "go too tight" which, didn't work and had me blow through 2 cartridges.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee

customer_reviews.title: And the beer was just as good as it was on the day that he got ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband as a Christmas gift. The day after Christmas he went to a local tap house to get it filled. He drank one beer out of it & then waited 5 days to have another one. And the beer was just as good as it was on the day that he got it filled. This is by far better than a normal growler!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift that arrived extremely late because of snow. When my husband was finally able to use it, the growler leaked from the top of the PSI gauge. You can see liquid in it now Liquid sprays out when filled. Of course the return window was over on March 7th so now we are stuck with a defective product. Overall, a really poor experience with Growlerwerks. Gift arrived super late and when we finally used it...defective. And now we can't return it.
customer_reviews.author: TAKAYO MINAKAMI

customer_reviews.title: Need come true
customer_reviews.text: So I needed a gift for my husband for his birthday and looked everywhere. I needed to go big since he went big for mine. I was looking for growlers when I got an email from amazon to look at this product. It was a need come true. Double vacuum sealed and has extra CO2 cartilage in the packaging. Husband was so happy that he took it to the local brewery to fill it up. Make sure to have to Surgen General warning on it when you take it to be filled. The sticker is included in the order. Was the best gift I have given in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Deysi Habeck

customer_reviews.title: Nothing but foamy beer
customer_reviews.text: Beer must be completely cold and undisturbed unless you want to deliver a pint glass of foam. Under best circumstances you still get a ton of foam. The internals of the tap system are at different diameters which is a recipe for turbulent flow which is great if you like a glass of foam.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Qi

customer_reviews.title: After multiple uses, I still can't keep pressure in the growler
customer_reviews.text: Like many others have said, there is an issue with the build of this, and the CO2 leaks out of the growler. I can keep beer fresh for a day or so, but once i take one pull from the keg, all the pressure is lost. I have tried all different methods of trying to keep the pressure in, but nothing seems to work. So it is less useful than a regular glass growler. Just save the money and stick with the glass growlers.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Teevan

customer_reviews.title: Spend your money elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Bottom line: spend the money on other solid metal growlers... I really wanted to love this product. I'd been eyeing one for years and finally pulled the trigger a bit ago. It worked perfectly the first 3 times it was filled. On the way to a brewery today, the empty growler fell over in the floorboard of the passenger seat. After having it filled at a local brewery, it hemorrhaged beer from multiple spots on the tap line, and I was unable to fix it on site. After getting home and transferring the beer to another growler, I was still unable to fix it. Unfortunately this product seems to not be very durable.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: A big let down. Only works sometimes.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband. He loves his beer and fills a growler at a local small brewery in his way home from work on the weekends. I got him this for his birthday thinking it would be perfect for him. And it was for a few fills but then the part that allows the carbonation in wasn’t working properly. He contacted the makers who were more then happy to try and help. However in the end they basically said they are a small new company and are working on fixing issues still. So basically we are left with a product that works sometime. Not really worth the over $200 price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for draft beer in a mini-system!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for storing and serving beer away from your keg and tap system. Looks good enough to put on the table when having guests. Keeps beer cold for a long time. Beer drawn has perfect foam and carbonation. It's also easy to clean and refill. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Fredrik

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE CHEAP CHINESE GARBAGE
customer_reviews.text: Bought this from the treasure truck for Father’s Day after lusting after it for a long time. After the 5th full it is no longer holding pressure. It is essentially a paperweight now. Taken this to 5 breweries and talked up the product each time to onlookers who were curious. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this pressurized growler
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this pressurized growler. It works great, looks amazing and is maintenance friendly. The customer service is second to none, friendly, curtious and very well informed. I look forward to MANY years of use.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory K

customer_reviews.title: Leaky and a pain to use
customer_reviews.text: You are going to need a lot of chargers to use this. Many times the chargers don't seat well and you waste one. The external keg looks great, but the cap is made of a plastic that just doesn't work well. I tried to use this for a month, but have given up. Don't buy it and certainly don't gift it.
customer_reviews.author: G. Kuyat

customer_reviews.title: Great if you have the time and patience to use it properly.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun, well made product and generally works. It is, however, more work than you might want. It keeps the beer in great drinking condition for a good week or more. However even when it was new, and since, I have to pretty much rebuild it every two fills, replace some gaskets, etc or it starts leaking gas and produces foamy pours or doesn't keep pressure. So if you like to tinker with stuff, it's fine - it'll keep your beer for a week, and give you a chance to play with and repair a gadget regularly. If you want a completely carefree way of keeping beer fresh, corny kegs might be a better option.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Steampunk flare... beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a beer drinker... but I did pick up one on sale for a local root beer brewery. I brought to fill up at one of their open houses and everyone was impressed. Very cool item The only thing that I think is a bit of disinformation is that for every use it requires 2 co2 canisters. The first for the pressurization of your beer. The second for the pressurization of the cleanup process. Regards of that little bit the product is well built and beautiful. Love it... just need to find more local sodas
customer_reviews.author: Quin Reisen

customer_reviews.title: It leaks, horribly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and it leaks out of the gooseneck. I went to return it but unfortunately amazon doesn’t except it as a return. I’ve tried tightening the nozzle but unfortunately nothing has worked.
customer_reviews.author: Annaliese Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I just did my first fill about two weeks ago. As per the instructions, the product worked as intended. The beer had plenty of carbonation and tasted just as good as it did at the brewery. After it was emptied, I rinsed it out, thoroughly, and used a cleaning tablet in it. I'm ready to fill it up again and enjoy a cold, frosty beer at my leisure. This is a must for anyone who likes going to craft breweries and has, or will be buying, a growler.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic idea but not reliable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my boyfriend last year and we both really, really wanted to it to work considering what I paid for it. Everywhere we went with it, we got compliments on it, and when it worked, it was great. We followed all instructions and even contacted the customer support, but they were not very helpful. It dripped constantly and didn't maintain the appropriate pressure. It ended up just being a mess. I'll revisit this product if they can improve it, but until then we're sticking with our insulated growler. Also, Growlerwerks, please don't comment on this review telling me to contact customer support--just fix the product.
customer_reviews.author: M. Files

customer_reviews.title: A Very Expensive Flower Pot
customer_reviews.text: Container worked great the first (2) times that it was put to use. After that.... utterly failure! After clogged pour spout issue was resolved, growler again failed to deliver with leaking, NO pressure finally causing me to just unscrew top and pour from there, totally defeating the purpose of a pressure-treated container. If you're going to drink beer right away, stick to a thermos-oriented container and transport in a cooler. One-Star rating is actually wayyyyyyy-to-high!
customer_reviews.author: david riederer

customer_reviews.title: Junk junk junk
customer_reviews.text: Worked for 2-3 uses. After that nothing but problems. Literally a$229 piece of garbage
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, performs well, scratches easily
customer_reviews.text: Looks: Amazing. The copper in particular, but they all look great, Performance: It takes a little getting used to handling the pressure. Temperature and volume remaining will vary the pressure quite a bit, so you have to keep an eye on it. It does keep beer carbonated nicely for at least a week in my experience, probably more. Unfortunately, to my regret, the very first brewery I took it to managed to leave a massive scratch all along the side, somehow. Since then it's picked up a few more scratches. The surface is definitely not scratch resistant at all, so don't expect it to look perfect forever. Price is maybe a touch high, but overall it's not bad value.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: I wish I hadn’t wasted the money
customer_reviews.text: When it works, it’s great, but my seal failed after just a few uses. I replaced all the parts recommended by Growlerwerks and it still won’t pressurize. Their customer support is pretty responsive, but the unit itself is delicate, prone to failure, and requires too much repair.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Trent

customer_reviews.title: I would consider buying a second
customer_reviews.text: I do think they need to work on the tap it self. After my second fill it stopped pouring, the tap would not move. GrowlerWerks support was amazingly fast at answering my support question and solved the issue right away. Since it's happen a couple of times since then I think they might want to work on what appears to be a design flaw. That all said love the product. I'd give one as gift, suggest to anyone to buy one and might buy a second.
customer_reviews.author: mcgowankm

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this for my husband. He was only able to use once due to pressure issues. It would either leak beer everywhere or beer wouldn't come out at all. Save your money folks
customer_reviews.author: lap73238

customer_reviews.title: Great so far.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Curious to see how long it can mantain the pressure. Will update this when I have more iterations. A great future modification would be an interchangeable tap that can swap between nitro and regular.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: ( Kinda disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: The tap is hard to close correctly. It is tight or something. Leaks a lot. However, one small bump and it goes off. Soaked our fridge in cider. :( Kinda disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: TK Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Most important piece is missing
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my husband's birthday and the box looked like it was opened already. Both CO2 cartridges missing!!! Will return and hopefully a new one will have all necessary parts.
customer_reviews.author: Justice

customer_reviews.title: Defective cap
customer_reviews.text: This product looks amazing unfortunately the weak point for this product is the cap. I've watched a few videos on YouTube to try and get this product to work with no luck. I've had the growler a over a month and have not been able to use it. My next step is customer service but I'm not willing to spend anymore money on tools or replacement to get this to work. Buy at your own risk.
customer_reviews.author: clemente galvan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome growler
customer_reviews.text: Great design and immediately loved by my beer-loving male&female friends. Easy for bringing your favourite beer from the bar. However, it is also easy to use for home brewing. Instead of adding sugar & bottling during the second fermentation process, just add your ‘flat’ beer and let the CO2 cylinders do their job.
customer_reviews.author: GROEN

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!! Amazon will not let you return it and it does not work!
customer_reviews.text: I got this off the treasure truck and was really excited to try it out. I spent $26 to have it filled and it kept leaking from the gauge. All my beer ended up leaking out, such a mess. Anyway this was a waste of $125. Do not believe any of the positive reviews. I found out a few friends have it and they have all had the same experience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great if you have a bar that will fill a growler!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my 25 year old son who goes to a local bar which fills growlers. The problem was that he and his roommate felt they needed to finish the growler that night or the beer got stale. This enables him to fill his growler and keep the beer pressurized and fresh for a week (so he tells me...I'm not sure they last a week before being emptied...)
customer_reviews.author: richmac

customer_reviews.title: It's definitely a little testy, but the customer service is great and it's a really awesome product.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the customer service. There are a few parts to this that are a little tricky and that wear out. There's no doubt about that. That's the one downside. But it looks awesome oh, and it really works well. It's not major stuff that needs to be taken care of. Basically o rings and things like that. But anytime I've had a problem they've been able to help me out really well and I really enjoy the product. It really helps when I make kombucha to have that extra step of pressure carbonation and make a really fizzy delicious product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great growler, and great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! I've had it almost a year now, and used it at least a dozen times. I mostly use it for homebrew, as it tends to go flat very quickly. Everything about this growler is great. It looks awesome, it works well. Recently the pressure gauge stopped working, I contacted GrowlerWerks and they responded almost immediately and within 3 days, I had a brand new pressure gauge. Everything is back to working perfectly. If you like your beer to stay fresh and carbonated, this is the best growler I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Hamman

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Product is tiny and not what I wanted at all. I thought possibly I could exchange the product for a larger size but that is not Evan an option. Customer service is non responsive as is amizon. Save your money unless you’re looking for something that holds three beers. Not worth it .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for personal use
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! I bought the 64oz growler for my personal use when working in the garage and it works perfectly keeping my favorite drinks fresh. I liked this so much I also bought the 128oz Growler for small gatherings and parties for me and my family/friends. I would definitely recommend this to anyone who is looking for a gift or something for themselves.
customer_reviews.author: JonnyS

customer_reviews.title: Co2 leak - Pressure Test before 1st use.
customer_reviews.text: Given as a gift, leaked on first use. The device would not hold the Co2. leaked immediately. If you are reading this pressure test your unit prior to filling with beer. $45 worth of local beer ruined.
customer_reviews.author: jb_lus

customer_reviews.title: Worked One Time - Issue with Spigot!
customer_reviews.text: Used once - now will not work. I bought one of these growlers despite reading all the negative reviews. 2 weeks go by I go to use it again and the spigot will not move I can’t unlock it. When I spend $200 for an item I want that product to work! It’s too bad because I really love that design. As for the owners you should contact your manufacturer and have them rework your product. When You do hit me - I’ll try it again.
customer_reviews.author: Qais Arabo

customer_reviews.title: Crap!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've used it 2x. Leaked like a collender. Unfortunately, i was dumb enough to buy extra CO2 cartridges that are now useless.....Feeling robbed.
customer_reviews.author: gee george

customer_reviews.title: Great Growler And A Real Head Turner!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in the 128 and 64 sizes and so far, both are working great. I prefer the extra capacity of the 128. I usually have the beer for around 10 days and it’s always been fresh and carbonated. You will get some attention and questions from other people at the breweries so it’s a good ice breaker if you want to meet some new people.
customer_reviews.author: Krond

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold the pressure!
customer_reviews.text: Does not hold the pressure! Followed instructions, yet the unit does not hold the pressure! In the end you have still beer. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: Broke first time we used it
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap for how expensive it was, it broke the first time we used it and the cap did not hold the liquid in as it leaked everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: william s crooks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for Christmas and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Mld

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice on the shelf but it leaks, it's hard to clean, it doesn't stay pressurized And it's very difficult to get it set to the right pressure for different beer. We hate it.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Giamongo

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great way to draft part of my craft brew batch. Now I don’t have to bottle as much. It has a handy reference guide it comes with for what psi to tap different beer style for, but I tend to just wing it and it turns out fine. No problem with cleaning. It’s not quickly but not labor intensive. Drop a cleaning tablet swish it around and wait a bit before pouring and rinsing. Better than scrubbing but cleaning sucks no matter what.
customer_reviews.author: Carlton

customer_reviews.title: Many problems
customer_reviews.text: Does not hold pressure. After a malfunctioning gauge was replaced I still have problems with air leakage. It will pressurize but after a day or two it's down to 0 pressure and then I lose the beer. I don't even oblige the problem yet but I've already spent more time than it's worth just to enjoy some beers. I'll just go back to drinking from the bottle
customer_reviews.author: Matthew W

customer_reviews.title: Replaced my kegerator!
customer_reviews.text: The uKeg is amazing. It has replaced my kegerator because i am only one man and i can only drink so much before the beer goes bad. I got the 128oz and i can still have fresh beer and can try new kinds more frequently than i could with a 5 gallon keg. And tons of places here in the Pacific NW fill growlers. The only gripe i have is that the spout leaks a drop every time i close it and it falls right onto the pressure gauge.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Varnam

customer_reviews.title: Customer service is non exiting. , valve is frozen, growler can not be used
customer_reviews.text: I received my unit on 11/9/2019 , since that time I had it filled and used it once . Right of the bat the valve was sticking and was very hard to operate . I was ready to return it but it started working OK . After a few weeks in the fridge the valve froze and I had to pour out the beer . I e- mailed customer service and got absolutely no reply or help of any kind . I am forced to remove the valve , if possible , and repair it . Right now it is a good looking dust catcher .
customer_reviews.author: DocWi

customer_reviews.title: Where’s the party?
customer_reviews.text: Just received this a couple days ago. Filled it up with bottle beer to try it out. First fill up lost pressure in a couple hours, but that must have been due to user error. Put in another cartridge. Made sure cap was tight. Pressured it up to 15 psi And immersed it in water to check for leaks. All looked good. Left it alone overnight. Checked pressure this morning. All is good. Just read the instructions and watch the videos and all should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Rene M Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for those with discerning beer
customer_reviews.text: Has wow factor wherever I take it. Easy to use and clean, no leaks, regulated pressure beautifully. I’d buy again if needed — but no need as it’s been a long lasting item (I’m just late in its deserving review)
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Love microbrews - get this growler.
customer_reviews.text: We love this growler. Coming from having growlers filled for years we didn’t think this would be much different - yet it is - the beer stays so fresh, like a fresh microbrew poured even after sitting for a week - every glass is fresh and crisp and you don’t have to worry about drinking the growler in a day or two. Only wish I would have got the 128oz.
customer_reviews.author: JenD.

customer_reviews.title: Pressure Gauge never worked
customer_reviews.text: We love the growler it seems to be keeping pressure but the gauge has never worked meaning it doesn't ever move past zero. Our friend who own a local brewery recommended this product and all agree the cartridge has been installed correctly it seems to be holding pressure but it does not move from zero so we have no control of how much pressure we want. This item is not returnable and I do not see a link to contact the seller. I'm hoping the seller will reach out and make this right so I can give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kept beer good for 10 days
customer_reviews.text: Worked well the two times I used it. Make sure to keep it clean. Kept beer good for 10 days .
customer_reviews.author: BE

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed with regulation piece
customer_reviews.text: It worked the first fill. After that it just leaks out the whole cartridge. Went through the o-rings and made sure everything was how it was designed to be and still won't hold charge. It pierces the cartridge before it seals up the holder. Other than that it is a very well made growler but the cheap plastic top could have been designed better
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Growler Ever
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I was skeptical with some of the reviews. Best growler ever!!!!! No more flat beer. I have refilled it multiple times. I bought the cartridges from GrowlerWorks and have no issues with fitment, or anything else. I can't say enough good stuff about this growler.
customer_reviews.author: KShephard

customer_reviews.title: Good for serving. Not for carbonating
customer_reviews.text: seems to be well made. But does not seem to be able to correctly force carbonate Homebrews like they claim followed the instructions very very well and after 3days no carbonation. Contacted them regarding it and they have yet to answer my questions and concerns. Seems to be more for serving already carbonated beer. Again seems well made just not meant for force carbonation. Also good luck with customer service they are beyond SLOW
customer_reviews.author: Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Pull the trigger and pull the handle
customer_reviews.text: I dont usually write reviews but if you love your local Brewers beer....BUY THIS. I filled this Two weeks ago and no flat beer. Sorry I slam my monster juice and vodka but slow drink my Stout Beer. DAMN GREAT I havent cleaned it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Best Growler
customer_reviews.text: This is the best growler I have ever owned. Keeps any beer I put in it tasting fresh and delicious. Lost mine on a trip and I didn't even think twice before deciding to buy a new one. There isn't a better growler out there.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Abel

customer_reviews.title: Great, useful gift!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 28 year old son as a Christmas gift. He loves it! Not only can you put beer in it for tailgating, etc but it also holds a gallon a mixed-beverage for other events. Mint Juleps on tap for Kentucky Derby!
customer_reviews.author: CES

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Experience
customer_reviews.text: The unit showed up 2 weeks late after being charged extra for expedited delivery. That is where my disappointment started. The whole unit is a disappointment. Returns are also far harder than they should be.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the product in November of ‘19 and just got around to trying it out; big mistake since I can’t return it. Tap leaks consistently no matter the PSI. Customer support is non existent so I can’t redeem the warranty. Lesson learned: try the product before the return window closes.
customer_reviews.author: Disgusted

customer_reviews.title: beautiful !
customer_reviews.text: What a great size ! love the copper ! great quailty and can contain 16 beers! perfect amount as well as it doesn't go stale! so important. Easy to lug along anywhere - camping, concerting, to games etc... perfect gift!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Massey

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a present awesome quality keep Speer really cold for extended periods of time will purchase from vendor again five stars
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beer is an experience, this helps it last. Kinda.
customer_reviews.text: Thanks for introducing me to this growler. I had never been able to enjoy the thought of filling one because it would be flat in 24 hours. I haven't been able to keep a beer because now I drink a gallon in one sitting... But let's focus on the good here. Baby steps
customer_reviews.author: Pickle CVMA

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: Really looks great and is nice to have. I wish they made a bigger one and I wish it were easier to use the cartridges. I went to a growler filling place and even THEY wasted a cartridge. I'll keep it though and keep using it b/c it's still pretty good!
customer_reviews.author: Baseball Fan

customer_reviews.title: It looks nice, serve great beer and makes people want one
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice, serve great beer and makes people want one. The capacity of the CO2 bulbe should have been bigger, barely one carbonation pluss emptying a keg.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GrowlerWerk
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift for a friend. It has not been used yet and we can not speak to the above so we gave it a 5. It looks like good quality. We are anxious to give this gift to our friend for his birthday this week.
customer_reviews.author: Sammie

customer_reviews.title: You need this!
customer_reviews.text: Gifted this to my husband and he loves it! Well made as nd a great seller to work with for even more of their items that aren't available from Some mazon
customer_reviews.author: Janners

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to like it but just ended up with flat foamy beer
customer_reviews.text: All I ever get is flat beer and foam not worth the purchase stick with a real keg beer. I have tried higher pressure and lower pressure and get the same results for both. Flat foamy beer.
customer_reviews.author: bstncld

customer_reviews.title: Worst product..I wasted my money for a useless thing!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this GrowlerWerks, for my brother on his birthday, and he used it only one time properly. Two days later(in the same week) he had guests at his house so he decided to use the product but it doesn’t work. He tried to clean it and fix it but unfortunately it wouldn’t work. I spent about $110 dollar on a wasteful product.
customer_reviews.author: Sumant

customer_reviews.title: Read the instructions.  They have you tube video as well.
customer_reviews.text: Not a single problem and functions as advertised. Just make sure to read the instructions real good and your set. It's a cool keg and fun to set up. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Clifton

customer_reviews.title: Regulator cap is cheap... stopped working after 3 fills
customer_reviews.text: My fiancee purchased this as a birthday gift for me and it was so exciting to receive. The first three fills were fine and it worked great. After I cleaned the device I was unable to load a CO2 cartridge (they all puncture prematurely. Honestly, the device is all well made except the most important part--- the cap that regulates Co2. It feels cheap and it shows as it no longer works. How about something a little sturdier. For $150 this product should work well for years, not two weeks. Disappointed. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT FROM the Growler Works website---- this product is non returnable to them. Fortunately, Amazon vouches for their products and issued a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: This growler is awesome. No problems what so ever
customer_reviews.text: This growler is awesome. No problems what so ever. Had it filled at least 6 times so far at a local brewery and bottle shops.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Yount

customer_reviews.title: Craft Beer Must!!
customer_reviews.text: Great growler, 4 pints to the ml, plan on new co2 cartridge each refill. Now just finding a place i can fill it and drink it. Great reason to never coming home M. T.
customer_reviews.author: William Weatherell

customer_reviews.title: Great for the beer lover!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son for his birthday...he loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Growler Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best gifts my husband says he’s ever received. Bring home your favorite brew straight from the brewery. Beer is fresh and tasty. CO2 is easy to setup. Now if I can just get one with an automatic high pressure release valve for those extra special brews, I’d be incredibly happy.
customer_reviews.author: Danise Otto

customer_reviews.title: frozen nozzle unable to open after 2 times i filled it
customer_reviews.text: product is great, the issue i have with spending $160.00 is that i used this 2 times and cleaned it per the instructions and now the nozzle is frozen, im unable to use it unless i purchase a new nozzle witch i dont know if that is possible or do they even sell it.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Marie Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Great support when issue with product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item. Perfect for hauling brews to party and it definitely makes a statement. I did have a QC issue with this, but they took care of the problem within the warranty period. I'd support them for future products.
customer_reviews.author: David G in PHX

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant invention!
customer_reviews.text: Great design, stylish, portable mini keg. There are numerous applications for this little unit. What more could a beer Connoisseur ask for. We’ll see how it holds up over time. So far it’s all positive.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Guggenheim

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for his birthday, and he absolutely loves it! He always gets comments by patrons and workers about how neat it is when he goes to the brewery to get it filled. Many people have not seen such a thing. Because my husband fills it with a lighter beer he doesn’t need to keep the pressure as high, which also means he doesn’t have to change the CO2 cartridge every time.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: I bought it as a gift,
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Growler for a gift for a friend and he called me to tell me how great it worked. Whenever he uses it is the topic of discussion.
customer_reviews.author: WD Curtis

customer_reviews.title: It was delivered with in 24 hours of ordering
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift so I won't know if there are any issues with it right away. I pulled it out of the box to inspect and it is a really nice growler with all the parts :) I received this within 24 hours of ordering it, totally impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Joeann Turck

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!  Really enjoying the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my dad, who loves his beers, for Christmas. It's a hit so far! I've read other reviews prior to buying(both good and bad), but it seems as long as you take care of the product it will be a great purchase. Will update accordingly if we run into any issues..
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: needs a bit of love from time to time
customer_reviews.text: Not maintenance free, needs a bit of love from time to time, especially keeping the o rings lubed up, I used this  Also, the lock is a bit stubborn, you have to push the spigot back a bit to get the lock to engage, but overall still 5 stars, very neat and keeps the brew fresh for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Xmas Present
customer_reviews.text: What a great gift. This was a gift for my husband and when we are invited to our friends' houses, they request for us to bring the growler. It's a novelty for everyone and a great way to share beer with friends. So glad we went with the larger size.
customer_reviews.author: maria kirby

product_meta.title: GrowlerWerks uKeg Carbonated Growler, 128 oz, Stainless Steel
product_meta.description:
Size:128 oz| Color:Stainless SteelWe love beer.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Share With Friends
feature_bullets: UKEG - keep beer fresh for weeks.
CARBOBONATION CAP - automatically regulates pressure to optimally carbonate beer. Choose desired carbonation level, from zero (off) up to 15 psi.
VESSEL - durable, double-wall Vacuum-insulated Stainless Steel.
PRESSURE GAGE - easily read the pressure inside the growler.
DISPENSER TAP - easily pours beer any time, without removing cap. Plus tap lock to prevent dispensing.
INTERCHANGEABLE TAP HANDLE - handle can be changed to personalize or represent your favorite Brewery.
SIGHT GLASS - shows contents of uKeg and how much is left.
CO2 CARTRIDGE - uses low cost, food-grade Co2 cartridges.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,462 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
